subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Reliever Heath Bell of the Mets can tell you all about the No. 7 train. He has been sent back and forth between the major leagues and Class AAA Norfolk enough times to leave him dizzy.
snippet: Reliever Heath Bell of the Mets can tell you all about the No. 7 train. He has been sent back and forth between the major leagues and Class AAA Norfolk enough times to leave him dizzy.
